title: Connect to DocumentDB from AWS Lambda using Java 17
description: This snippet demonstrates how to use Amazon DocumentDB from an AWS Lambda function written in Java. It includes a CDK project that creates a CRUD API based on Amazon API Gateway as the frontdoor to a backend powered by Lambda and DocumentDB

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Inspect the samples in java/documentdb/sample to see the Java code or follow the instructions in the README to deploy the stack.
